entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -17.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -17.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -19.5°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches near the river this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:13 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 07:13 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:13 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
